sofh.ui.actor.name: Character name:
sofh.ui.actor.reputationrank.1: Rank 1: Everyone at Hogwarts hears about what you did.
sofh.ui.actor.reputationrank.2: Rank 2: Everyone at Hogwarts knows your face and name.
sofh.ui.actor.reputationrank.3: Rank 3: Some people outside of Hogwarts have heard about you.
sofh.ui.actor.reputationrank.4: Rank 4: You get your name in the Daily Prophet
sofh.ui.actor.reputationrank.5: Rank 5: Many people in the Wizarding World know who you are.
sofh.ui.actor.goalgryffindor: Pull off an awesome stunt, save someone, keep being awesome!
sofh.ui.actor.goalhufflepuff: Comfort someone, make a new friend, prove that being good is its own reward!
sofh.ui.actor.goalravenclaw: Invent something new, discover a new place, don't get in trouble!
sofh.ui.actor.goalslytherin: Make a new contact, gain something of worth,increase your reputation!
sofh.ui.xpmasage: Choose one from below. When any player character reaches all five advancements, a school year ends, and everyone can pick one season advancement.
sofh.ui.xpoptin1: Take a new move from your house
sofh.ui.xpoptin2: Take a new move from your house
sofh.ui.xpoptin3: Take a move from a different house
sofh.ui.xpoptin4: Take a move from a different house
sofh.ui.actor.seventhconditions: You are eliminated from the scene (e.g. you flee, fall unconscious, or freeze helpless, etc.). MC decides when you can come back.
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorquestion1: Are you acting with bravery or protecting friends?
sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffquestion1: Have you put in the work?
sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffquestion2: Are you taking what you believe is the most just and fair course of action?
sofh.ui.actor.slytherinquestion1: Are you working toward a personal goal?
sofh.ui.actor.slytherinquestion2: Have you weighed all potential outcomes and picked the one most beneficial to you?
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawquestion1: Are you using reason and logic?
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawquestion2: Are you discovering or creating something new?
sofh.ui.housequestionlabel: At the beginning of any game session, highlight one of the questions below. Whenever a move asks two questions, ask your highlighted house question, too. Add +1 if you answer “yes”:
sofh.ui.relationships.caught_breaking_ru: You got caught breaking the rules with:
sofh.ui.relationships.snuck_into_forest_: They snuck into the Forbidden Forest with you because you convinced them to:
sofh.ui.relationships.score_instructions: You start one relationship with +2, one with -1, and the rest with +1. Range: from -2 to +2.
sofh.ui.relationships.title: Your Relationships
sofh.ui.instructions.fill_in_with_player: Fill in at least two with other player characters:
sofh.ui.instructions.fill_in_with_charac: Fill in all with other characters (PC or NPC):

sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffreq: School robes with a Hufflepuff crest, a wand, a bag full of school books, a quill and a pot of ink, a cauldron, and spare parchment

sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawreq: School robes with a Ravenclaw crest, a wand, a bag full of schoolbooks, a quill and a pot of ink, a cauldron, and spare parchment.

sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawmuggle_device: A muggle device you've rigged to work at school
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawbag_of_notes: A bag stuffed full of notes from your studies
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorpet: A rat, a cat, a toad, or an owl
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorsubscription: A Daily Prophet / Witch Weekly subscription
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorpartial_map: A partial map of Hogwarts and the grounds
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorquidditch_equipm: A snitch, quaffle, bludger, or beater's bat
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorbertie_botts_bea: A box of Bertie Bott's Every Flavor Beans

sofh.SETTINGS.showHousePointHint: When this option is enabled, House points are displayed on the table. Only the host can change the points. Positive points are entered without a sign, while negative points require a minus before the number. Confirm by clicking the Apply button.
sofh.ui.relationships.long_time_crush: You have a huge, long-time crush on:
sofh.ui.relationships.survived_with_help: You never would have passed your classes if it wasn't for::
sofh.ui.relationships.snuck_out_with: They caught you smoking gillyweed, but didn't tell:
sofh.ui.relationships.trust_with_secrets: You always share your sweets with each other:
sofh.ui.relationships.fiercest_rival: Your fiercest rival, always trying to one-up you:
sofh.ui.relationships.life_savior: The person who saved your life, and you feel you owe them:
sofh.ui.relationships.biggest_crush: Your biggest crush, even though you don't know how they feel about you:
sofh.ui.relationships.betrayed_trust: Someone who betrayed your trust and you're still not over it:
sofh.ui.relationships.sneaked_into_libra: You convinced them to sneak into the restricted section of the library with you:
sofh.ui.relationships.caught_cheating: They once caught you cheating, but didn't turn you in:
sofh.ui.relationships.helped_with_invent: They helped you with one of your inventions when you were stuck:
sofh.ui.relationships.deepest_secret_kno: Your deepest, darkest secret is known by:
sofh.ui.relationships.insulted_but_given: You once badly insulted them, but they gave you a second chance:
sofh.ui.relationships.lost_valuable_retu: You once lost something valuable, but they returned it to you:
sofh.ui.relationships.comforted_in_vulne: They once comforted you in a moment of extreme vulnerability:
sofh.ui.dialog.other_factor: Other factor impacting roll, click to open
sofh.ui.dialog.other_factor_close: Other factor impacting roll, click to close
sofh.ui.actor.gryffindorTimeToShine: This is your moment to be a hero, to be the center of attention, and have everyone remember your name. Nothing can stop you or stand in your way. You blast through every barrier, defy all odds, stand courageous and valiant, and emerge victorious. You stop every enemy and save everyone, and you look awesome doing it!
sofh.ui.actor.hufflepuffTimeToShine: This is the moment where all your hard work and dedication pays off. You may be frequently overlooked and undervalued, but not right now. You're the one making the calls, because you're the one who believes in justice and fairness, and you won't stand by and let the bad guys win. You do what it takes to save the day, and you do it your way, the right way.
sofh.ui.actor.ravenclawTimeToShine: You finally reveal the true extent of your genius—a spell, invention, or piece of knowledge that gives you exactly what you need to save the day. You take control, defeating even impossible odds with your wit and skill. Everyone sees exactly what you're capable of, and even your enemies are impressed.
sofh.ui.actor.slytherinTimeToShine: This is the moment when all your plans come to fruition—or everything falls apart and you're forced to act with all the desperation and willpower you have. Are you calm and in control or raw and laid bare for all to see? Either way, the situation bends to your will, exactly how you want it.
